软件包 org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.base64

Encoder and decoder which transform a Base64-encoded String or ChannelBuffer into a decoded ChannelBuffer and vice versa.

请参见：
          描述


类摘要
Base64 Utility class for ChannelBuffer that encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
Base64Decoder Decodes a Base64-encoded ChannelBuffer or US-ASCII String into a ChannelBuffer.
Base64Encoder Encodes a ChannelBuffer into a Base64-encoded ChannelBuffer.
 

枚举摘要
Base64Dialect Enumeration of supported Base64 dialects.
 

软件包 org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.base64 的描述

Encoder and decoder which transform a Base64-encoded String or ChannelBuffer into a decoded ChannelBuffer and vice versa.
